title: Citadel of Minas Tirith (3R40)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. You may heal a [Gondor] companion at the end of each turn during which no companion or ally lost a skirmish.
Lore:	”'One day our paths will lead us there, and the Tower guards shall take up the call - The Lords of Gondor have returned.'”
Rarity:	R
